title: My Life in the Nineties
description: Poetry. The continuation of the project begun in Hejinian's best-selling MY LIFE also available from SPD MY LIFE IN THE NINETIES provides important glimpses into related works such as HAPPILY, THE BEGINNER, and SLOWLY. Part prose poetry, part autobiography, and part radical modernist experiment, MY LIFE IN THE NINETIES is a masterpiece of recent writing on identity, language, and politics."
author: Lyn Hejinian
